skills.skill: Cloud Data Platforms (Azure, AWS, Google Cloud)
Database Technologies (Big Query, Redshift, Vertica, DynamoDB, BigTable, Cosmos DB, SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL)
Data Pipeline Implementation (Azure Data Factory, Glue ETL, Lambda, Spark, Spark Streaming)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead, design, develop, and deliver large-scale data systems, data processing, and data transformation projects
Automate data platform operations and manage post-production system and processes
Conduct technical feasibility assessments and provide project estimates for the design and development of the solution
Provide technical inputs to agile processes, such as epic, story, and task definition

Creation and maintenance of infrastructure-as-code for cloud, on-prem, and hybrid environments using tools such as Terraform, CloudFormation, Azure Resource Manager, Helm, and Google Cloud Deployment Manager
Mentor, help, and grow junior team members

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field (Master's preferred)
Developer certifications for any of the cloud services like AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure
